local_intent: Perform the grasp of the white plate using the computed grasp (white_plate_grasp): verify perception, move above, align, execute pick, and confirm grasp stability with retries.
assumptions: Computed grasp pose 'white_plate_grasp' is available on the blackboard

coherence_with_global: Follows the GLOBAL_BT grasp phase: uses the computed grasp key, moves above and aligns to the white plate, executes Pick with the specified timeout, and verifies grasp stability; includes retries for perception and grasp as per failure_and_recovery.
